comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydroPID2 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydroPID2/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Hydro turbine and governor. Represents plants with straight forward penstock configurations and three term electro-hydraulic governors (i.e. Woodard electronic).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: atw
contents.comment: Factor multiplying Tw (Atw).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: d
contents.comment: Turbine damping factor (D).  Unit = delta P / delta speed.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: feedbackSignal
contents.comment: Feedback signal type flag (Flag). true = use gate position feedback signal false = use Pe. Default: False

contents.name: g0
contents.comment: Gate opening at speed no load (G0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: g1
contents.comment: Intermediate gate opening (G1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: g2
contents.comment: Intermediate gate opening (G2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening (Gmax).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmin
contents.comment: Minimum gate opening (Gmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Derivative gain (Kd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Reset gain (Ki).  Unit = PU/ sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Proportional gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: p1
contents.comment: Power at gate opening G1 (P1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: p2
contents.comment: Power at gate opening G2 (P2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: p3
contents.comment: Power at full opened gate (P3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rperm
contents.comment: Permanent drop (Rperm).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Controller time constant (Ta) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Gate servo time constant (Tb) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: treg
contents.comment: Speed detector time constant (Treg).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: velmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening velocity (Velmax).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: velmin
contents.comment: Maximum gate closing velocity (Velmin).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
